abstracts.cdata!:
The Moldova Environmental Infrastructure
            Project aims to fulfill its obligations under several
            international agreements to protect trans-boundary water
            courses from pollution. The project entails the construction
            of a wastewater treatment plant which may cause noise, dust,
            fumes emission, nuisance for residents, temporary cut-off
            water supply. However, their impacts are temporary and can
            be essentially minimized by the appropriate construction
            management and construction monitoring. The appropriate
            mitigation measures are listed in this report and in the
            Environmental Management Plan. They include: obligations of
            the contractors, environmental protection management, labor
            camps and occupational health management, safety management,
            and social management The impact of construction on the
            aquatic environment is not anticipated, with the measures
            imposed to the contractor to control the river pollution
            from the construction site.
